author: chfast
content: Are there any tests already for Prague in execution-spec-tests?

author: danceratopz
content:
Hi Pawel, not yet, <@892053833121923094> started working on EIP-2537 (BLS12-381 Precompiles Tests), but it's still a WIP, https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/499. 

You can check which tests are available in main here (currently empty ðŸ™ƒ ) https://ethereum.github.io/execution-spec-tests/main/tests/prague/ - of course you're always welcome to check directly with us!

Was there something particular you were looking for tests for?

author: chfast
content: Yes, we want to migrate EOF execution tests. I want to start with some examples to get familiar with the infra and get feedback from you.
